name: Invigorate
help: Increases level scaling of the spell

name: Energize
help: Increases level scaling of the spell

name: Close Range
help: Gives a spell range of close range

name: Short Range
help: Gives a spell range of short range

name: Line
help: The spell now affects a line within range

name: Cube
help: The spell now affects several cubes within range

name: Multi Target
help: The spell now targets additional targets within half range of the first target

name: Basic Energy
help: Any effects the spell manifests can be based on one of the four elements

name: Arc
modifiers: description: If spell hits the targets or the targets fails the save, the spell arcs to %add%1;%lvl%%/add% additional targets adjacent to the initial targets, automatically hitting and applying the arcing effect. The new targets take %min%%mult%25;%amm%%/mult%;100%/min%% of the triggering spells damage

name: Blast
help: The spell now affects a blast within range

name: Cone
help: The spell now affects a cone within range

name: Dimensions
help: Increases the size of an AoE

name: Duplicate
modifiers: description: Each purchase of Duplicate creates either additional instance of an AoE effect or Multi Target or creates another application of the spell on each target

name: Leech
help: Restore a portion of damage dealt
modifiers: description: Any damage dealt by this spell restores hitpoints of a target within range of this spell equal to %min%%mult%50;%amm%%/mult%;100%/min%% of the damage dealt. If the spell affects an area, the healing may be distributed among any number of valid targets within range.

name: Material
help: Conjured objects are made of specific material
modifiers: description: Any conjured tools, armor and weapons can be made from a special material. Material Tier is equal or less than spell level

name: Necrotic
help: Gives access to necrotic energy type

name: Phantasm
modifiers: description: The illusion counts as %min%%mult%25;%amm%%/mult%100%/min%% 'real', allowing it to interact with the environment and potentially deal damage

name: Reach
help: Gives a spell increased melee reach

name: Trigger
help: Spell goes off on a triggered condition
modifiers: description: The spell doesn't go off until it is triggered by a set condition or by a mental command. The spell lasts for 1 minute or until triggered. Spell Failure chance does not apply to the trigger spells until the moment they are triggered, and is based on the casters failure chance at the moment
